original_text: When he had caused the tribe of Benjamin to come near by their families, the family of Matri was taken, and Saul the son of Kish was taken: and when they sought him, he could not be found.
korean_text: 베냐민 지파를 그들의 가족별로 가까이 오게 하였더니 마드리의 가족이 뽑혔고 그 중에서 기스의 아들 사울이 뽑혔으나 그를 찾아도 찾지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: When he had caused the tribe of Benjamin to come near
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 베냐민 지파를 가까이 오게 했을 때

sentences.original_text: the family of Matri was taken
and Saul the son of Kish was taken
